ss.unicode: ਬ੍ਰਾਹਮਣਾ ਨੂੰ ਬਹੁਤ ਦੱਛਣਾ ਦਿੱਤੀ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਸ੍ਰੀ ਕ੍ਰਿਸ਼ਨ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖ ਕੇ ਚਿਤ ਵਿਚ ਬਹੁਤ ਸੁਖ ਪਾਇਆ ਹੈ।

transliteration.english: bipran dheen ghanee dhachhanaa sukh pai kitai jadhubeer chitai kai ||
transliteration.hindi: बिप्रन दीन घनी दछना सुखु पाइ कितै जदुबीर चितै कै ॥
transliteration.en: bipran dheen ghanee dhachhanaa sukh pai kitai jadhubeer chitai kai ||

transliteration.ipa: bɪpɹən d̪in Gʰəni d̪əɕənɑ sʊkʰ pɑeɪ kɪt̪æ d͡ʒəd̪ʊbir t͡ʃɪt̪æ kæ.

en.bdb: Suitable presents were given to the Brahmins and with great pleasure, he offered his daughter to Krishna.2111.

transliteration.hindi: जीति सुअंबर मै हरि आउध के भूपति की दुहिता जब आयो ॥

en.bdb: When Krishna came back after winning the daughter of the king of Oudh is mvara, he made up his mind to roam in the forest alongwith Arjuna

en.bdb: There he caused to be brought Poppy plant, hemp, opium and various kinds of wines for drinking, there he also called many beggars and singers, who came in groups.2112.
